channel.title: CVE Feed for WP EasyCart -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP EasyCart -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34645|2024-08-04T00:19:47.854Z -- wp%20easycart -- shopping%20cart%20%26%20ecommerce%20store
item.description: The Shopping Cart & eCommerce Store WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the save_currency_settings function found in the ~/admin/inc/wp_easycart_admin_initial_setup.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 5.1.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32452|2024-08-02T02:06:44.285Z -- wp%20easycart -- wp%20easycart
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WP EasyCart.This issue affects WP EasyCart: from n/a through 5.5.19.

item.title: CVE-2024-35667|2024-06-11T17:12:25.237Z -- wp%20easycart -- wp%20easycart
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WP EasyCart.This issue affects WP EasyCart: from n/a through 5.5.19.

item.title: CVE-2024-32452|2024-06-04T17:52:09.931Z -- wp%20easycart -- wp%20easycart
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WP EasyCart.This issue affects WP EasyCart: from n/a through 5.5.19.

item.title: CVE-2024-35667|2024-08-02T03:14:53.756Z -- wp%20easycart -- wp%20easycart
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WP EasyCart.This issue affects WP EasyCart: from n/a through 5.5.19.
